content: meet the **snowdrift wheat stitch™ slipper socks** your new cozy companions for chilly winter days these slipper socks are a true winter dream come true wrapping your feet in warmth and style crocheted in simple row with my oh-so-popular snowy wheat puff that everyone s swooning over they re as fun to crochet as they are to wear perfect for lounging by the fire or as a thoughtful handmade gift these socks will surely bring a little extra joy to your winter an included ** video tutorial 1 ** ensures you ll have all the guidance you need to create these cozy slippers crochet hook g 4 0mm -
